channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google CEO: "No company is going to be immune" if AI bubble bursts
item.description: There is some "irrationality" happening in the AI boom, and a burst bubble would not spare anyone, Google CEO Sundar Pichai told the BBC . Why it matt...

item.title: Exclusive: Sanders pushes Senate Dems to go big on health care deal
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) is urging Senate Democrats to unite behind an expansive health care proposal in the party's negotiations with Republicans ...

item.title: Trump's $2,000 tariff checks would boost growth at a $450B cost, study says
item.description: President Trump's promised $2,000 tariff checks would probably cost $450 billion but provide small boosts in both economic growth and employment, per ...

item.title: NIH cuts impacted 74,000 clinical trial patients: study
item.description: The Trump administration's termination of federal research grants earlier this year disrupted about 1 in 30 clinical trials funded by the National Ins...

item.title: Scoop: Mike Johnson to back Epstein files discharge petition
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) is reversing course and throwing his support behind a petition to compel the Justice Department to release all its ...

item.title: Trump faces a splintering GOP — and rare dissent from his party
item.description: The House of Representatives on Tuesday will vote to release additional investigation files related to the deceased sexual predator Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Larry Summers stepping back from ‘public commitments’ over Epstein emails
item.description: A longtime Democratic adviser, Summers has had significant influence over economic policymaking for decades.

item.title: Before House vote, bill’s supporters push for release of Epstein files
item.description: An expected successful vote will send the legislation to the Senate, where pressure is mounting to compel the Justice Department to release more docum...

item.title: Trump HIV prevention plan shuts out South Africa — the nation most affected
item.description: Administration officials say South Africa has “significant means” to fund a promising new drug, lenacapavir, on its own. Critics call the move self-de...

item.title: Saudi crown prince to meet Trump in White House, shedding pariah status
item.description: The de facto Saudi ruler was branded a pariah in 2018 after the killing of Washington Post columnist Jamal Khashoggi. Now, U.S.-Saudi relations are ap...

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
